### Example application

All __hypeR__ methods are compatible with R Shiny and can be incorporated into a variety of applications. For users looking to adopt __hypeR__ in their own projects, we have created an example project using various __hypeR__ methods in Shiny. If you are looking to use __hypeR__ in your own applications and need help or have questions on the implementation, please feel free to reach out to us!.

#### Live demo
